statements: DELETE FROM OsteoporosisTracking WHERE patient_id = 100 AND measurement_date = '2022-09-15';
DELETE FROM OsteoporosisTracking WHERE bone_density <= 0.5 AND measurement_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM OsteoporosisTracking WHERE patient_id = 1001 OR (bone_density BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.4);
DELETE FROM BoneDensityMeasurement WHERE measurement_type='DEXA' AND density_value < 0.5;
DELETE FROM Patient WHERE age > 60 AND gender='Male';
DELETE FROM bone_density WHERE bone_density < 0.5 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM research_data WHERE patient_id = 100 AND study_date < '2019-06-01';
